sentences.sContent: She hopes to resume work after the baby is born.
sentences.sCn: 她想生完孩子后继续工作。

sentences.sContent: The rebels have resumed hostilities against government troops.
sentences.sCn: 叛乱分子继续与政府军发生冲突。

sentences.sContent: ...and his resume lists jobs at companies like American Express...
...He had a perfect resume and gave good responses to her questions...
...I see from your resume that you speak Japanese...

remMethod.val: re ＋ sume(拿起) → 重新拿起 → 重新开始

words.tran: 恢复；重新开始；取回；重获；恢复硬币支付

trans.tranCn: 重新开始， 继续， 恢复
trans.tranOther: to start doing something again after stopping or being interrupted

trans.tranCn: 摘要， 概要； 简历
trans.tranOther: a short account of something such as an article or speech which gives the main points but no details
